purpose: The email is a Call for Papers (CfP) for the EICS 2026 conference, inviting submissions for the first round of Full Papers and Technical Notes. The conference will take place from June 22-26, 2025, in Trier, Germany, and focuses on engineering interactive computing systems and their user interfaces. The submission deadline for the first round is July 25, 2025. The email outlines the topics of interest for submissions, which include various aspects of interactive systems engineering, and provides details on the submission process and publication in the Journal Proceedings of the ACM on Human-Computer Interaction.
